name: Cosmic Endeavor
description:
Hi,

this is a simple HTML game draft (to be played on a Desktop pc browser) i started creating during the harsh days of quarantine, without me being a real game developer. I'm not sure even how to categorize this.

You as the commander and your crew, need to stay ahead of the rival aliens in resquing the human habitants. 

Please be patient first time start takes some time loading.

Start with planet Alpha,  then try Centauros and finally when you know how to command your crew move on to a battle on Zeus.

All artwork is draft. No storyline implemented yet.

For DETAILED HELP press HELP ON TOP OF GAME SCREEN

i would very much appreciate your feedback & impression about its gameplay.
